name: Inside Bar Volume Breakout FX
description: Price action strategy trading inside-bar breakouts on 1-hour charts for the three most liquid major FX pairs. Enters on a close outside the inside bar with >=110% of 20-bar average volume. Risk capped at 0.5 % of equity via fixed-fraction position sizing. Stop set at 0.25 % beyond the opposite side of the inside bar; no take-profit, positions exit on opposite close or after 5 hours.
